ssot__OpportunityProduct__dlm.name: Opportunity Product
ssot__OpportunityProduct__dlm.description: The Opportunity Product DMO represents a specific product or service being purchased and delivered to the client or prospect.

ssot__CloseDate__c.description: The date when a record was closed.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date when a record was created.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the currency of the sales opportunity.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DiscountPercentage__c.description: The discount for a product as a percentage.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified a record.

ssot__Name__c.description: A short description of the opportunity’s product.

ssot__OpportunityId__c.description: A reference ID to a deal or sale that is in progress and isn’t yet completed.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the Opportunity Product DMO.

ssot__PricebookEntryId__c.description: A reference ID to list of products and their prices.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID to what's intended to be sold, for example, goods or services.

ssot__ProductQuantity__c.description: The number of product units in an opportunity.

ssot__QuoteProductId__c.description: A reference ID to item on a quote for prospective purchase of goods and services.

ssot__ServiceDate__c.description: The planned date when the to-be purchased product is in service.

ssot__TotalPriceAmount__c.description: The sum of all the product amounts for the opportunity’s product.
